name: covid-19
description: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease first identified in 2019 in Wuhan, China, and spreading globally. Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.

name: ebola
description: Ebola virus disease (EVD) is a viral fever of humans and other primates common in Africa. Symptoms include a fever, sore throat, muscular pain, and headaches, but can escalate to internal organ failure.
